title: Enhancement of third-order optical nonlinearity of VSe2 by hybridizing with CoSe2 as flower-like nanoparticles
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,27741-27748
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04192E, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Marziyeh Parishani, Marzieh Nadafan, Sajad Akbarpoor
Hybrid nanostructures make remarkable alterations in nonlinear optical features compared to pristine components. The VSe2–CoSe2 hybrid nanostructures with superior FOM parameters were demonstrated to be promising candidates in optical switching.
